# rightShoulder

**Instance Property**

The right shoulder button element.

## Declaration

```swift
var rightShoulder: GCControllerButtonInput { get }
```

## Discussion

The shoulder buttons in the gamepad profile are analog buttons.

## Reading Shoulder Button Inputs

- **leftShoulder**: The left shoulder button element.
